original_text: For behold, I am calling all the tribes of the kingdoms of the north, declares the Lord, and they shall come, and every one shall set his throne at the entrance of the gates of Jerusalem, against all its walls all around and against all the cities of Judah.
korean_text: 내가 북방 왕국들의 모든 족속들을 부를 것인즉 그들이 와서 예루살렘 성문 어귀에 각기 자리를 정하고 그 사방 모든 성벽과 유다 모든 성읍들을 치리라 여호와의 말이니라

sentences.original_text: I am calling all the tribes of the kingdoms of the north
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 북방 왕국들의 모든 지파를 부르고 있다

sentences.original_text: and every one shall set his throne
at the entrance of the gates of Jerusalem
against all its walls all around
and against all the cities of Judah
